whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies
whatAreCookies.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device to ensure the site's functionality and analyze its use.

strictly.title: Strictly Necessary:
strictly.description: Required for the site to work (e.g., saving login sessions). Consent is not required for them.

analytical.title: Analytical:
analytical.description: Google Analytics, Hotjar. Help us understand how users interact with the site. Used only with your consent.

marketing.title: Marketing:
marketing.description: Facebook Pixel. Used to show relevant advertising. Used only with your consent.

consentManagement.title: 3. Consent Management
consentManagement.content: You can change your cookie settings at any time via the "Privacy Settings" panel on our website.
